title: Genesis Vision Referral program
text-1: Go to “Profile” and get your personal link
text-2: Invite your friends to sign in via referral link to get the agent’s commission
text-3: Get up to 15% of the agent’s commission
text-4: A 2-level partner program is utilized by the Genesis Vision platform. Invite your friends to sign up for the Genesis Vision platform and you will be eligible to receive up to 15% commission from their paid fees for the 1st level referrals and up to 1.5% for the 2nd level referrals.
title-list-1: Rate and general rules for obtaining the agent's commission
text-list-1: Commission rate directly depends on the amount of GVT stored in the wallet.
text-list-2: If there is less than 1 000 GVT stored in the wallet, the commission will be 10% of the paid fees from the 1st level referrals and 1% of the fees from the 2nd level referrals.
text-list-3: If there is 1 000 GVT or more stored in the wallet, the commission will be 15% of the paid fees from the 1st level referrals and up to 1.5% of the fees from the 2nd level referrals.
text-list-4: Agent's commissions are accrued once per day at 9:00 AM (UTC).
text-list-5: The commissions from all your referrals are summarized each day and the total amount accrued for that day is transferred to the wallets. The wallet currency depends on the currency used by  your referrals to pay for fees.
text-list-6: The wallet is checked for a 1 000 GVT balance once per day at a random time.
title-list-2: How we calculate the commissions you have earnt :
text-list-7: From Trading Fees :  we generate commissions from each transaction generated when your referral is trading on Genesis Markets.
text-list-8: From Programs : commissions are generated from Entry Fees that are charged to investors entering a Program (excluding Genesis Markets).
text-list-9: From Funds : earn commissions from Entry Fees that are charged by the platform. These fees are charged as a percentage of the initial amount invested in a Fund.
text-list-10: From Platform Success Fees: this fee is calculated according to the HWM system as a percentage of the profit received from a program during the reporting period, or from a trade transaction when copy trading. We only generate commissions in the event of your referral making a profit. We do not charge a Platform Success fee if there is no profits made.
